pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Only in the oiledmachine-overlay:
This ebuild tracks only the highest point releases corresponding to the corresponding LLVM version up to the latest current stable LLVM.
LLVM 15 (dev) - 3.1.15 LLVM 14 (stable) - 3.1.3 LLVM 13 (stable) - 2.0.26 LLVM 12 (stable) - 2.0.12
The release cycle is rolling, so there is no stable or no LTS versions for this project.
These ebuilds only version by tags and release notes for a particular point release may be found in the next version bump.
